org.magicdgs.readtools

Class RTDefaults

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.magicdgs.readtools.RTDefaults

  • public final class RTDefaults
extends java.lang.Object
    Default constants for ReadTools. All this constants are settable by a java property as '-Dreadtools.propertyname'. This class is similar to Defaults.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BARCODE_INDEX_DELIMITER
      Delimiter between barcode when several indexes are used.

      Suffix for discarded output file(s).
      static boolean FORCE_OVERWRITE
      Force overwrite of output files.
      static long MAX_RECORDS_FOR_QUALITY
      Maximum number of record used to guess the quality of a file.
      static int SAMPLING_QUALITY_CHECKING_FREQUENCY
      Read sampling frequency to check if the quality is really Standard.

    • Field Detail

      • BARCODE_INDEX_DELIMITER

        public static final java.lang.String BARCODE_INDEX_DELIMITER
        Delimiter between barcode when several indexes are used. Default='-'.

      • BARCODE_QUALITY_DELIMITER

        public static final java.lang.String BARCODE_QUALITY_DELIMITER
        Delimiter between quality for barcodes when several indexes are used. Default=' '.

      • MAX_RECORDS_FOR_QUALITY

        public static final long MAX_RECORDS_FOR_QUALITY
        Maximum number of record used to guess the quality of a file. Default=1000000.

      • SAMPLING_QUALITY_CHECKING_FREQUENCY

        public static final int SAMPLING_QUALITY_CHECKING_FREQUENCY
        Read sampling frequency to check if the quality is really Standard. Default=1000.

      • FORCE_OVERWRITE

        public static final boolean FORCE_OVERWRITE
        Force overwrite of output files. Default=false.

      • DISCARDED_OUTPUT_SUFFIX

        public static final java.lang.String DISCARDED_OUTPUT_SUFFIX
        Suffix for discarded output file(s). Default="_discarded"
